topic.title: Reusing existing localization variables from org.dita.pdf2

body.p: If you have already created a PDF2 localization variables file for the new language 'ta.xml' located in the DITA-OT/plugins/org.dita.pdf2/common/vars folder, you can reuse it by copying it to a 'ta-dita-vars.xml' file in the target strings folder, alongside the 'langlist.xml' file and the MiramoPDF 'ta.xml' strings file. (note: copying the file to cfg/common/vars, as is commonly done for PDF2 transformations, will have no effect).
To register the 'ta-dita-vars.xml' file add the following entry to the end of the 'langlist.xml' file: <lang xml:lang="ta" filename="ta-dita-vars.xml"/>
